description:
The universal design attaches to portable propane stoves and provides safe, simple operation. Fits all standard portable propane appliances, tabletop grills, and propane torches.

  • Can be recycled through some municipal programs
  • 465g canister is non-refillable
  • Manufactured to exceed the requirements of the US Department of Transportation and Transport Canada
name: Coleman Propane Fuel Cylinder 453g
